sentences.en: A lone gull flew across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一只孤单的海鸥飞过天空.

sentences.en: A lone sea gull flew across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一只孤独的海鸥在空中飞过.

sentences.en: A sea gull flies right for you.
Any of several species of gull - like oceanic Birds in the family Procellariidae.
As I watched, a gull flew by, above the spruces.
sentences.cn: 在我观望的时候, 一只海鸥飞过云杉.

sentences.en: At least the death cry of the insignificant sooty gull gave her back her significance.
sentences.cn: 至少,这只不起眼的黑海鸥临死前那一声尖叫恢复了她的理性.

sentences.en: I accidentally ran across a book entitled'sea Gull " .
sentences.cn: 我偶然见到一本书,名字叫《海鸥 》.

sentences.en: My sister bought a new & quot ; sea - gull & quot ; camera which cost him 5000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 弟弟新买了一部价值五千元的 海鸥 牌像机.

sentences.en: Several other sub-species of gull are found in the region.
sentences.cn: 在该地区还发现了海鸥的其他亚种。

sentences.en: The gull held the fish in its beak.
The gull sees farthest who flies highest.
sentences.cn: 望得远的海鸥就能飞得高.

sentences.en: The gull was planning down in circles without moving a wing.
sentences.cn: 海鸥盘旋下降,翅膀一动也不动.

sentences.en: The ivory gull often follows polar bears to feed on the remains of seal kills.
sentences.cn: 象牙海鸥经常跟在北极熊的后面吃剩下的海豹尸体.

sentences.en: Uttering a cry , the sea gull flaps its wings.
sentences.cn: 那阵阵长啸,是海鸥在展翅搏击.

sentences.en: Where has sea gull wrist watch special counter Beijing?
sentences.cn: 海鸥手表专柜北京哪里有?

sentences.en: You have to practice and see the real gull, the good in every one of them, and to help them see it in themselves.
sentences.cn: 你应该通过练习去认识真正的海鸥，要看到每只海鸥的美德，并帮助他们去认识自己的美德。

trans.tran_en: a large common black and white sea bird that lives near the sea
